hashtags.description: Just add TikTok hashtags and the scraper will collect information about users, followers, likes, and more.

resultsPerPage.description: Maximum number of posts that will be scraped from every hashtag. If set to 15 or lower, the scraper can utilize faster method of scraping that doesn't require scrolling.

shouldDownloadVideos.description: Whether to download TikTok video files. Note that this will increase time required for the scrape

shouldDownloadCovers.description: Whether to download TikTok video cover images (i.e. thumbnails). Note that this will increase time required for the scrape

shouldDownloadSlideshowImages.description: Whether to download TikTok slideshow images. Note that this will increase costs and time required for the scrape

videoKvStoreIdOrName.description: Name (or ID) of the Key Value Store where the videos and other media like thumbnails will be stored. Omit to store in the default one. Using this option will provide a named Key-Value store can help b

disableEnrichAuthorStats.description: Sometimes Tiktok's API will not return author stats (their hearts, follower count etc) for profile/hashtag/sound pages, so an additional query will be needed. This will slow the scraper down

disableCheerioBoost.description: If the requested number of posts is small, the Cheerio crawler (much faster) will be used. If for some reason you need to disable this, turn on this option
